newsitem.title: USA: Keystone Auto to merge with North Star.
newsitem.headline: Keystone Auto to merge with North Star.

text.p: Keystone Automotive Industries Inc Wednesday said it signed a definitive agreement to merge with North Star Plating Co.

The transaction, which will be accounted for on a pooling of interests basis and is expected to close by February 28, 1997, is subject to shareholder and regulatory approval and other conditions typical for transactions of this nature.
A Keystone spokesman was not available for terms of the agreement.
Keystone Automotive Industries is the largest distributor in the nation of aftermarket automotive collision repair parts and North Star is the second largest.

Prior to this merger, Keystone had 47 service centers in 26 states. When the transaction is consummated, the company will have 67 service centers in 31 states, with North Star maintaining its name in its 20 locations after the transaction.
A Keystone spokesman later said terms of the deal remain undisclosed.
